summary: LSE is a top university in London, England, known for social science studies. Founded in 1895 by Fabian Society members, it joined the University of London in 1900. LSE offers many degrees and has a large endowment. It's located in central London and has a diverse student body. The school is part of several important university groups and has been ranked as the best university in the UK. Many famous people, including Nobel Prize winners and heads of state, are LSE alumni.
title: London School of Economics
